message: I'm feeling generous. Take $10,000 and we're done.  But if you reject this, we're both going to lose money in the next round.
I think we can both do better than that.  Take $50,000 and we'll call it a day.  If you reject, you'll lose 5% of your share, and I'll lose nothing.  Think about it.
I'm willing to meet you halfway.  This is a fair split considering the inflation.  Accept and we both get a good amount, or risk losing more in the next round.
